
---
title: '充液系统动力学(五)：准均匀涡旋运动'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - 科学网
 - 博客
headimg: 'https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/091408yhap8z8wapruwl8h.png'
author: 科学网
comments: false
date: Fri, 03 Dec 2021 14:08:00 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/091408yhap8z8wapruwl8h.png'
---

<div>   
<p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:52px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-size: 16px;"><strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">1.<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">       </span></span></strong><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><strong><span style="line-height: 150%;">平均涡量与平均亥姆霍兹方程</span></strong></span></span><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><strong><span style="line-height: 150%;"></span></strong><strong><span style="line-height: 150%;"></span></strong></span></p><p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size:14px;font-family:宋体">  </span><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;">前文“<span style="font-family: 楷体, 楷体_GB2312, SimKai; font-size: 18px;">充液系统动力学(四)</span>”叙述了椭球腔内理想流体的一种特殊有旋流动，称为均匀涡旋运动。由于椭球腔内流场各点的涡量<span style="font-size: 20px; font-family: "times new roman";"> <strong><em>Ω </em></strong></span>均相同，可作为描述流体运动的离散化变量，连同主刚体的角速度 <span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">ω</span></em></strong></span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">建立充液系统的动力学方程求解。但这种建模方法的应用范围十分有限，即仅限于椭球形腔体。1974 年德国的普费弗（Pffeifer,F.）教授提出 “准均匀涡旋运动” 概念，可将这种建模方法的适用范围扩大到非椭球腔的更一般情形</span><sup><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">[1]</span></sup><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: 宋体;">。</span></span><br></p><p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: 宋体;"></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">此方法的特点是将非椭球形腔的流场各点的涡量在腔内平均化，涡量</span><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify;"> </span><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; white-space: normal;"><em>Ω </em></strong></em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">的平均值</span>称为<strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">平均涡量</span></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，记<span style="text-indent: 28px; font-family: "times new roman";"><span style="line-height: 24px;">作<span style="font-size: 20px; text-align: justify;"> </span><strong style="font-size: 20px; text-align: justify;"><em>Ω</em></strong></span><em><sub>a</sub></em>: </span><span style="text-indent: 28px; font-family: "times new roman";"> </span></span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">                                                                       </span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%">                                                <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/091408yhap8z8wapruwl8h.png" title alt="准1.png" width="169" height="65" style="text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal; font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: center; width: 169px; height: 65px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                              (1)</p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">其中 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">V</span></em></span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">为流场的积分域，也表示充液腔的体积。将平均涡量 </span><strong><em><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal; font-size: 20px;"><em>Ω</em></strong></em></strong><em><sub>a </sub></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">代替实际涡量，所描述的流体运动称为<strong>准均匀涡旋运动</strong>。</span></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;">前篇博文中曾导出理想流体有旋流动的亥姆霍兹方程：</span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";">                                          <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/091627rictvww9et1fffvj.png" title alt="准2.png" width="237" height="73" style="width: 237px; height: 73px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                   (2)<br></span></p><p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: 宋体;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">其中波浪号表示相对刚体的局部导数，</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>ω</em></strong></span><strong><em> </em></strong>为刚体的角速度<em>。</em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">将方程中各项在流场</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">V </span></em></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">中平均化，流速</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span></span><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">v </span></em></strong></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">公式中的涡量 </span><strong><em><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal; font-size: 20px;"><em>Ω</em></strong> </em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">以平均涡量 </span><strong><em><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal; font-size: 20px;"><em>Ω</em></strong></em></strong><em><sub>a </sub></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">代替，写作</span></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: 宋体;">                        <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/092102plr11andqn9pz7fl.png" title alt="准3.png" width="164" height="38" style="width: 164px; height: 38px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                         <span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px;">(3)</span></span><br></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: 宋体;"></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">其中 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong>▽</strong><em>ϕ </em></span>为<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">附加流速，以保证腔壁边界条件得到满足。<span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman";">以腔体中心 <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>O</em></span><em> </em>为原点，建立腔体坐标系 <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">(<em>O-x</em><sub>1</sub><em>x</em><sub>2</sub><em>x</em></span><sub>3</sub>)，以 <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>e</em></strong><em><sub>j </sub></em>(<em>j</em>=1,2,3) </span>为基矢量。</span>将上式代入方程 (2) 的右边，且利用以下关系式：</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                    <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/092418kq64d9rbbm3ib34c.png" title alt="准4.png" width="575" height="141" style="width: 575px; height: 141px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">             (4)</span></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: 宋体;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;">得到平均化的亥姆霍兹方程：</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";">                                       <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/092640t0pnopooll0nllul.png" title alt="准5.png" width="359" height="68" style="width: 359px; height: 68px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                    (5)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><strong style="white-space: normal;"><span style="line-height: 24px; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">      </span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman";"><strong style="white-space: normal;"><span style="line-height: 24px;">  </span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;"><strong style="white-space: normal;"><span style="line-height: 24px;">2</span></strong><strong style="white-space: normal;"><span style="line-height: 24px;">．轴对称腔情形</span></strong></span></span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><span style="font-size:14px;font-family:宋体">  </span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">设腔体为相对 <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>x</em><sub>3</sub></span><sub> </sub>轴对称的轴对称体，充液刚体的稳态运动是主刚体连同凝固的液体以角速度 <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>ω</em></strong></span><sub>0 </sub>绕 <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>x</em><sub>3 </sub></span>轴做整体的永久转动。受扰后的刚体角速度 <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>ω</em></strong></span><strong><em> </em></strong>和平均涡量 <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>Ω</em></strong><em><sub>a</sub></em></span><em><sub> </sub></em>与稳态运动 </span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>ω</em><sub>0</sub><strong><em>e</em></strong><sub>3 </sub></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span></sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">之差，以及附加流动速度 </span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">▽</span></strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">ϕ</span></em></span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">均为扰动量。仅保留各扰动量的一次项，使用图1所示的柱坐标</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">r</span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">, </span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">θ</span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">, <em>z</em></span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，利用高斯定理将式 (5) 化作</span></span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">               <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/105657e40i60bjb8dbj8kx.png" title alt="准6.png" width="558" height="69" style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; text-align: center; white-space: normal; width: 558px; height: 69px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                    (6)</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">其中 <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>n</em><sub>3</sub></span><sub> </sub>为腔壁曲面 <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>Σ</em></span><em> </em>上任意点处的法线 <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>n</em></strong></span><strong><em> </em></strong>相对 <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>x</em><sub>3</sub></span><sub> </sub>轴的方向余弦。设<span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>l </em></span>为沿腔壁母线<span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>L</em></span><em> </em>的曲线坐标，则有 <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>n</em><sub>3</sub>d<em>l </em>= -d<em>r</em></span>，可将上式化作</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";">            <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/110006oolm9zg0ww989o0o.png" title alt="准7.png" width="597" height="61" style="width: 597px; height: 61px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">        （7）<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p style="margin-left:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-size: 16px;"><br></span></p><p style="margin-left: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><strong><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:宋体"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt width="398" height="409" style="width: 398px; height: 409px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><br></span></strong></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p style="text-align:center;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;">图1  轴对称腔壁上任意点的柱坐标</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;"><br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">将</span>式 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">(4) 代入其中的 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong>▽</strong><em>ϕ</em></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，化作</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                                      <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/110317w0zz7ldooluu7nu0.png" title alt="准8.png" width="350" height="69" style="width: 350px; height: 69px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                              (8)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">参照<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">前篇博文的说明，势函数 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>ϕ</em></span><em> </em>应等于<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">茹可夫斯基势函数 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>ψ</em></strong></span><strong><em> </em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">与 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>ω-Ω</em></strong><em><sub>a </sub></em></span>的点积<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，即</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;"></span>                                                  <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/115307koav7uh33t3j6vj4.png" title alt="准9.png" width="167" height="47" style="width: 167px; height: 47px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                           (9)<br></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">将势函数 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>ψ</em></strong></span><strong><em> </em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">分离变量，表示为</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                                             <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/115509teb7723u6zbw7hg5.png" title alt="准10.png" width="313" height="48" style="width: 313px; height: 48px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                             (10)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">将</span>哈密顿算子 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong>▽ </strong></span>用柱坐标表示            </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">       </span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";">       <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/115653mt58waipcfsflics.png" title alt="准11.png" width="576" height="66" style="width: 576px; height: 66px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">               (11)</span><br></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: 宋体;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">利用式 (10),(11) 导出并矢 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong>▽</strong><strong><em>ψ </em></strong></span>在 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">(<em style="font-family: "times new roman"; white-space: normal;">O-x</em><sub style="font-family: "times new roman"; white-space: normal;">1</sub><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; white-space: normal;">x</em><sub style="font-family: "times new roman"; white-space: normal;">2</sub><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; white-space: normal;">x</em><sub style="font-family: "times new roman"; white-space: normal;">3</sub>) </span>中的坐标矩阵：</span></p><p style="text-align: center;">           <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/120559etqqaxjvxq8bum1t.png" title alt="准12.png" width="582" height="227" style="width: 582px; height: 227px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">        (12)<br></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">将上式代入式 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">(9) </span>的积分式<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，导出</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                            <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/121006yfrrezdnadara6ua.png" title alt="准13.png" width="447" height="256" style="width: 447px; height: 256px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                           (13)<br></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;">再代入式 (9)，简化为</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                                    <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/121216e6lgh2izgowglgwt.png" title alt="准14.png" width="400" height="74" style="width: 400px; height: 74px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                              (14)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;">依次代入 (8), (7), (6) 等式，导出</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span>                              <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/121441sn84tmwt8kn422tf.png" title alt="准15.png" width="415" height="67" style="width: 415px; height: 67px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                        (15)<br></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">其中 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>Γ </em></span>是影响平均涡量变化率的参数，由沿轴对称腔体母线 <em>L </em>的曲线积分确定。</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">                                                     <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/121638myy1n1apm0tyrl6n.png" title alt="准16.png" width="240" height="70" style="width: 240px; height: 70px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                       (16)<br></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">对于母线为任意形状的轴对称腔，其中的参数 </span><em><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; white-space: normal;">Γ </em></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">总能用数值方法导出。如腔体具有规则的几何形状，则有可能导出 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>Γ </em></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">的解析式。</span>将<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">式 (15) 代入平均化的亥姆霍兹方程 (5)，得到</span></span></p><p style="text-align: center;">                                <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/121843ji68eoloelj8zgib.png" title alt="准17.png" width="368" height="73" style="width: 368px; height: 73px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                (17)<br></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">工程实践中的充液腔，例如航天器的燃料储箱外形多为轴对称。上述轴对称腔体的计算公式具有实际意义。</span></p><p><br></p><p style="margin-left:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">3．旋转椭球腔情形</span></strong></span></p><p style="margin-left:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><strong><span style="line-height: 150%;"></span></strong></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">对于旋转椭球腔的特殊情形，因流场内各点的涡量 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>Ω </em></strong></span>相同，<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">亥姆霍兹方程 (17) 中的平均涡量 </span><strong><em><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal;"><em>Ω</em></strong></em></strong><em><sub>a </sub></em>即流体的实际涡量 <strong><em><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal;"><em>Ω </em></strong></em></strong>，可将下标 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>a </em></span>略去，改为</span></p><p style="margin-left: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><strong><span style="line-height: 150%;">                                <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/132120om85zz9fibv28ccl.png" title alt="准18.png" width="384" height="68" style="width: 384px; height: 68px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                (18)</span></strong></span><br></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">设旋转椭球的曲面方程为</span></p><p style="text-align: center;">                               <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/132339z9p6iil3tg7pmx5q.png" title alt="准19.png" width="356" height="71" style="width: 356px; height: 71px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                  (19)<br></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">设椭球腔相对</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">x</span></em><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">3 </span></sub></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">轴对称，令 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">x</span></em><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">1</span></sub><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">= r</span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">cos</span><em>θ</em>, <em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">x</span></em><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">2</span></sub><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">= r</span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">sin</span><em>θ</em>, <em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">x</span></em><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">3</span></sub><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">= z</span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，</span><em>λ = a</em><sub>3</sub>/<em>a</em><sub>1</sub></span><sub> </sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">为半轴比，将直角坐标变换为柱坐标，代入式 (19)，导出腔体的母线方程：</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                                                     <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/132855un1gytr1utzt0rew.png" title alt="准20.png" width="211" height="53" style="width: 211px; height: 53px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                            (20)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:宋体"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">椭球腔的茹可夫斯基势函数 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>ψ</em></strong></span><strong><em> </em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">已在式 (10) 中给出，改用柱坐标表示为</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                                           <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/133152xz6cf6d6f6d5gf5f.png" title alt="准21.png" width="338" height="36" style="width: 338px; height: 36px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                      (21)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;">其中</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";">                                              <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/133521sj1ru2oebsurrpsp.png" title alt="准22.png" width="216" height="75" style="width: 216px; height: 75px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                (22)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:宋体"></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">将式 (21), (22) 代入式 (16)，令 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">V </span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">= 4</span>π<em>λa</em><sub>1</sub><sup><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">3</span></sup><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">/3</span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，且利用式 (20) 消去 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%; font-size: 20px;"></span></span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">z</span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">。对母线的上半段<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%; font-size: 20px;"> (d<em>r </em>< 0) </span>和下半段 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%; font-size: 20px;">(d<em>r </em>> 0) </span>分别积分，叠加后得到</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span>                       <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/134238basf5ba0z57bqzs8.png" title alt="准23.png" width="409" height="80" style="width: 409px; height: 80px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                               (23)<br></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="text-indent:29px;line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:宋体"></span><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">圆柱形腔是存在解析积分的另一特例，其用柱坐标表示的解析形式势函数 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>ψ </em></strong></span>已由茹可夫斯基导出。对于半径为 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>a</em></span>，半高为 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>h </em></span>的圆柱腔，解析形式的参数 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>Γ</em></span><em> </em>为<span style="font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;"></span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;">                                           <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/03/134542lallqoojoopaoi2u.png" title alt="准24.png" width="246" height="83" style="width: 246px; height: 83px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                             (24)<br></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">其中</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span><em>ζ<sub>j  </sub></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">(<em>j </em>= 1, 2, 3) </span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">为一阶贝塞尔函数 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">J</span></em><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">1</span></sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">(<em>x</em>)</span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> 的导数零点。</span></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"><br></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><strong><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:宋体">参考文献</span></strong><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:宋体">：</span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:'Times New Roman',serif">[1]  Pfeiffer,F. Ein Näherungsverfahren für Flüssigkeitsgefüllte Kreisel. <em>Ingenieur Archiv</em>, 1974, <strong>43</strong> </span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:'Times New Roman',serif"><strong><br></strong></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:'Times New Roman',serif"></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:宋体"> </span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman";">（改写自：王照林，刘延柱. 充液系统动力学. 第3章. 北京：科学出版社，2002</span></p><p style="text-indent:98px;line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman";">       刘延柱. 陀螺力学(第二版)，第10章. 北京：科学出版社，2009）</span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:'Times New Roman',serif"><strong><br></strong></span><br></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"><br></span><br></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"><br></span></p><p><br></p>                    <br><br>
